item.title: Re: Village Jutsu Information
item.content:encoded:
I have three suggestions so far. Feel free to take the ideas and run with them.

1) The Wiki Style: Informed Strike, grants encyclopedic knowledge of an enemy village's layout, defenses, and patrol routes, mechanically granting a bonus to spying or attacking attempts.

2) The Wiki Style: Collective Mind, grants 10% bonus XP upon completing missions as you tap into the Wiki Village's collective knowledge of all things ninja.

3) The Wiki Style: I've Read His Profile, uses information collected on a specific person to aid in finding said person, triggered by residual chakra similar to WhiteEye or RedEye sensitivity. Grants a bonus to recruiting a randomly joining ally.

item.title: Re: Village Jutsu Information
item.content:encoded:
The Wiki is all about information, so jutsu should be also about information.

Jutsu that used at mission and mission is success will reveal all mechanics of mission, % of drops from allies used, % for item or allies found, requirements to get something etc.

Name should also be connected to village: "Wiki no jutsu".
